name: The Two Door Chiltern Sideboard
description: The Two Door Chiltern side cabinet is a long-standing favourite with Davidson clientele with its signature clean lines and beautiful finishing, including a chamfered edge detail and polished metal trim crafted to the highest degree of excellence. Made by hand in the Davidson British workshop, the cabinet boasts flawless high gloss and satin timbers options with a luxurious choice of metals to choose from. Finished to perfection both inside and out, the two door Chiltern cabinet opens on push latches to reveal a timber interior. Within the cabinet are adjustable shelves and the option of a bank of drawers for additional storage if required, making it the ideal setting for any smart lounge, dining room, bedroom or home office.
